org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.ismTransactions

Class ISMReference<VALUE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions.ImmutableReference<ISMap<VALUE>>
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.ismTransactions.ISMReference<VALUE>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blade, IsolationBlade, ImmutableSource<ISMap<VALUE>>

    public class ISMReference<VALUE>
extends ImmutableReference<ISMap<VALUE>>
    Supports validation and notifications of changes to an ISMap.
